tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genomic_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
  sequencing_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE genomics_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  sequencing_method VARCHAR(50),
  sequenced_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES genomics_data(sample_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SequencingResults (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID REFERENCES GenomeSamples(sample_id),
    analysis_date DATE,
    coverage FLOAT,
    variants_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE GeneticVariants (
    variant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID REFERENCES GenomeSamples(sample_id),
    chromosome TEXT,
    position INT,
    gene_name TEXT,
    variant_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  condition VARCHAR(100),
  sequence_data BYTES
)

CREATE TABLE sample (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patient(patient_id),
  date_collected DATE,
  tissue_type VARCHAR(50),
  quality_score DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE experiment (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT REFERENCES sample(sample_id),
  experiment_type VARCHAR(50),
  read_depth INT,
  coverage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE variant (
  variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT REFERENCES experiment(experiment_id),
  chrom_position INT,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(10),
  allele_frequency DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT REFERENCES experiment(experiment_id),
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result_details TEXT,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50)
)
